title: 换了新电脑 启动不了了
author: chyx
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Daisy, daisy...

Time: 19-3-12 下午2:48
Description: Unexpected error

java.lang.NullPointerException: Unexpected error
    at cqx.n(SourceFile:1377)
    at cqx.d(SourceFile:922)
    at cqx.b(SourceFile:412)
    at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:154)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:
    at ddj.a(SourceFile:449)

-- Affected level --
Details:

    All players: 0 total; []

    Level storage version: 0x00000 - Unknown?

    Level game mode: Game mode: survival (ID 0). Hardcore: false. Cheats: false

    at ddj.a(SourceFile:449)
    at cqx.b(SourceFile:1920)
    at cqx.b(SourceFile:425)
    at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:154)

-- System Details --
Details:
    Minecraft Version: 19w09a
    Operating System: Windows 10 (x86) version 10.0
    Java Version: 1.8.0_191, Oracle Corporation
    Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
    Memory: 369461624 bytes (352 MB) / 591396864 bytes (564 MB) up to 1073741824 bytes (1024 MB)
    JVM Flags: 6 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx1024m
    Launched Version: 19w09a
    LWJGL: 3.2.1 build 12
    OpenGL: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 620 GL version 4.5.0 - Build 25.20.100.6472, Intel

Using GL 1.3 texture combiners.
Using framebuffer objects because OpenGL 3.0 is supported and separate blending is supported.
Shaders are available because OpenGL 2.1 is supported.
VBOs are available because OpenGL 1.5 is supported.

    Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
    Type: Client (map_client.txt)
    Resource Packs: 
    Current Language: English (US)
    CPU: 8x Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U CPU @ 1.60GHz

replies.txt_content:

现在未响应了
连崩溃日志也没有。。。
Win10的话换旧的java8

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2019-3-16 22:19 编辑 
ljh221 发表于 2019-3-12 16:04
Win10的话换旧的java8
我在启动器里设置了最大内存 

把他从1024改成了900
现在能进入游戏一小下了
